channel.title: Dodian spec errors

item.title: Dodian spec errors
item.dc:creator: @kryptwalker0 kryptwalker0
item.description:
@kryptwalker0 wrote:

public void calculateSpecial() {
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153 && specialAmount <= 49) {//maul
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
sendMessage(“You do not have enough special energy left.”);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153 && specialAmount >= 50) {//maul
startAnimation(1667);
maulSpec();
specialDamage = 40 + misc.random(10);
specialAmount -= 50;
}

i try this use that for a granite maul special and it wont work this is the error i get

client.java:6941: cannot find symbol
symbol : method startAnimation(int)
location: class client
startAnimation(1667);
^
client.java:6942: cannot find symbol
symbol : method maulSpec()
location: class client
maulSpec();
^
i aleady hav the thing that the spec bars go down during specials
but im stuck on adding specials

how do i add specials to dodian then plz and ty

Read full topic
